channel.title: Has anyone heard of/know of crayzay/crazay and who they were/are?
channel.description: Back when I was playing RuneScape, mining, I remember seeing account names like "crazay" and "crayzay", always mining in the Mining Guild. Anyone know who these people/this person were/was? I know for fact that they were typically associated with botting and were considered the biggest botters in RuneScape...

item.title: Has anyone heard of/know of crayzay/crazay and who they were/are?

Back when I used to play (world 34 F2P), I saw them a lot. Back about five years ago…

item.title: Has anyone heard of/know of crayzay/crazay and who they were/are?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Jagex Games Studio is trumpeting its legal victory against Mark and Eric Snellman. The brothers formed a company called Impulse Software, which now owes Jagex unspecified damages following a two-year legal battle concerning macro and botting tools for the company’s RuneScape MMO.

The brothers have been muzzled as a result of an injunction, and they are forbidden from discussing Jagex, RuneScape, or the lawsuit. Additionally, the pair must relinquish “all websites, domains, source code and customer details to Jagex along with all the details of all those individuals who have developed scripts for iBOT and sold or re-sold those scripts,” according to a company press release.

Read full topic
item.source: Has anyone heard of/know of crayzay/crazay and who they were/are?
